Perform subcutaneous puncture.sentence: The nurse prepares the necessary equipment for the subcutaneous puncture.
Perform subcutaneous puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform subcutaneous puncture.sentence: The nurse cleans the puncture site on the patient’s skin with antiseptic.
Perform subcutaneous puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform subcutaneous puncture.sentence: The nurse inserts the needle into the subcutaneous tissue at the selected site.
Perform subcutaneous puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform subcutaneous puncture.sentence: The nurse administers the medication slowly into the subcutaneous tissue.
Perform subcutaneous puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform subcutaneous puncture.sentence: The nurse removes the needle and applies a gauze pad to the puncture site.
Perform subcutaneous puncture.subject: The nurse
